thread.title: In a World Awash with Gas, Why Finding More is Good for Eni
thread.title_full: In a World Awash with Gas, Why Finding More is Good for Eni - WSJ

author: Helen Thomas
title: In a World Awash with Gas, Why Finding More is Good for Eni
text:
The world may not be short of oil and gas. But it is good news for Eni that the Italian company has found another slug of it.
Eni has discovered a vast gas field off the coast of Egypt in the Mediterranean Sea. With a potential 30 trillion cubic feet of gas, the field represents close to half Egyptâ€™s proven gas reserves and about 18 years of natural gas consumption, notes Raymond James.
The find ticks a number of boxes. Eni...
